name: Nxtdroid
tagline: Android based Lego Mindstorms NXT Direct Protocol implementation
body:
This is an Android app (and API that you can build from) that controls a Lego Mindstorms NXT via Bluetooth.

You can generate a Codenvy clone of this project. Compile it in browser, download it directly to your Android device.

[![alt](https://codenvy.com/factory/resources/factory-white.png)](https://codenvy.com/factory?id=uom9dloyncmco3a2)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
